property.name: ARRAY_NAME
property.description: Name of this Greenplum system enclosed in quotes.

property.name: SEG_PREFIX
property.description: Naming convention for utility-generated data directories.

property.name: PORT_BASE
property.description: Base number by which primary segment port numbers are calculated.

property.name: DATA_DIRECTORY
property.description: File system location(s) where primary segment data directories will be created. The number of locations in the list dictate the number of primary segments that will get created per physical host (if multiple addresses for a host are listed in the hostfile, the number of segments will be spread evenly across the specified interface addresses).

property.name: MASTER_HOSTNAME
property.description: OS-configured hostname or IP address of the master host.

property.name: MASTER_DIRECTORY
property.description: File system location where the master data directory will be created.

property.name: MASTER_PORT
property.description: Port number for the master instance.

property.name: TRUSTED_SHELL
property.description: Shell utility used to connect to remote hosts.

property.name: CHECK_POINT_SEGMENTS
property.description: Maximum log file segments between automatic WAL checkpoints.

property.name: MIRROR_PORT_BASE
property.description: Base number by which mirror segment port numbers are calculated.

property.name: REPLICATION_PORT_BASE
property.description: Base number by which primary file replication port numbers are calculated.

property.name: MIRROR_REPLICATION_PORT_BASE
property.description: Base number by which mirror file replication port numbers are calculated.

property.name: MIRROR_DATA_DIRECTORY
property.description: File system location(s) where mirror segment data directories will be created. The number of mirror locations must equal the number of primary locations as specified in the DATA_DIRECTORY parameter.

property.name: MACHINE_LIST_FILE
property.description: Specify the location of the host address file here instead of with the the -h option of gpinitsystem.
